name: Dinner Tonight: Alice Waters's Carrot Soup
description: Some of my neighbors were out of town last weekend and graciously let us plunder their CSA shipment. I'm completely new to this process. It's such an odd feeling to walk home from the farmers' market with a large box...
recipeIngredient: 1 1/4 pounds carrots, peeled and thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Toss the butter into a pot set over medium-low heat. When butter has melted add the onion and thyme. Continue cooking on medium-low heat for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add the carrots and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Pour in the stock and turn the heat to high. Bring to a boil and then reduce the heat, add the salt, and simmer for 30 minutes.
